abstract: Apple Inc. has sold its millionth iPhone less than three months after the device’s debut, allaying investor concerns that demand had slowed.
snippet: Apple Inc. has sold its millionth iPhone less than three months after the device’s debut, allaying investor concerns that demand had slowed.
lead_paragraph: Apple Inc. has sold its millionth iPhone less than three months after the device’s debut, allaying investor concerns that demand had slowed.

headline.main: In 3 Months, iPhone Sales Top a Million
headline.print_headline: In 3 Months, IPhone Sales Top a Million
